alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 11:25PM CST until November 29 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAUDERDALE...SOUTHEASTERN COLBERT...NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 1125 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Littleville, or 7 miles southwest of Tuscumbia, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Russellville, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Killen, Town Creek, Littleville, Leighton and St. Florian. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
